title: J.Q. Dickinson Appalachian Mercantile
excerpt: Curator of Appalachian food, crafts, home and bath goods. Get a subscription to have an assortment delivered monthly or seasonally. Appalachia's finest goods. Appalachia is home to high quality artisans and producers. We want to share these fine products with the world.

title: Serving Up West Virginia History, Not All of It Sweet (Published 2019)
excerpt: While big-name chefs take up Appalachian cooking, a farm couple are using old seeds and recipes to tell a more complex story and lift up their region.

title: This little butcher shop in rural West Virginia is turning out world-class
excerpt: A young couple’s grocery store could start a patty pilgrimage to Capon Bridge.

title: Long Misunderstood, Appalachian Food Finds the Spotlight
excerpt: Chefs like Sean Brock and Katie Button are embracing and expanding on the region’s cooking, which is far more varied than most people realize.

title: Is the best restaurant in West Virginia a campsite on the Gauley River?
